title: Beautiful 1 bedroom apt Next2 Yeshiva University
map_address: 184th st near 184th st and St. Nicholas ave
posting_body: ['Beautiful, sunny and spacious apartment in Washington Heights with TONS of storage space near Yeshiva University and an easy commute to Columbia Presbyterian as well as all of Manhattan.', ' Great access to all of NYC, NJ, and points North!', 'The apartment features:', '-Exposed brick in the living room and bedroom', '-Separate kitchen looking through to living room', '-Hardwood Floors', '-Heat & water included with rent', '-beautiful Lobby, with New Security cameras installed all around building.', '-2 Blocks to #1 train and about 7 mins to A Train', '-Great Closets & Storage Space above closets', '-Built in shelves in bathroom', '-Safe & Clean Building', '-On-site super', '-Lots of Sun', '-Many dining options in the area', '-1 Block to Yeshiva University', '-Close to several NYC Parks & the Cloisters', '-Plenty of On-street parking (garage 2 blocks away)', '-Laundromat directly across the street (and wash & fold)', '-No Pets', '-RENT STABILIZED!', 'We are looking for tenants that can show proof of income (40x the rent) and good credit is a must.', '*We are open to using guarantors for people that have not yet established credit history.']
